North from Chonku Chuli the pink granite mass of Makalu emerged
above the seemingly vertical snow walls of the West Col ( 6135 m ) .

Then the balloons were off rising
above Herefordshire to eleven and a half thousand feet instead of the planned ten and a half thousand .

His tawny skin was stretched tight over the bone , his winged black eyebrows rose
above a nose that curved like a falcon 's over his wide mouth .

He hung his biggest cage
above the library entrance but it kept falling down , capturing the Headmaster .

She forced the sad and crushed skull below the snow and piled the ice
above it .

above your knees so you can feel and see the muscle contractions .

above her .

When she looked around Deborah could see the roof and chimneys peeping
above the brow of the meadow .

Fully clothed , enormous in midnight-blue serge suit and peaked cap , he knelt
above her , rhythmically slapping her face with a pendulum action of his heavy-gloved hand .

Her hair was dipping into the water and , stooping
above her , Matthew was carefully pouring water from the jug , making a cascade over her hair as it washed the soapy water back into the bath .

The brown teapot with a slightly broken spout sat like a cold little sentinel on the hob , jackdaws rustled
above it in the chimney .

The man swore at her before turning away , the seagulls screeching
above his battered hat .

A bell tolled
above his head .

A flock of Siberian tits twitters away
above us .

He could not hear me
above the din of the crowd .

She had just pressed it a second time when she heard a faint voice
above the High Street traffic .

The woman lowered her voice so that Ianthe could hardly hear it
above the noise of the train .

It would be untrue to have said it was impossible to hear the Beatles
above the screaming .

The Doctor began to speak , in a voice so quiet Piper wondered how she could hear his words
above the storm .

The spire of St Kentigern 's , seen
above the Banks , carries one elongated isosceles triangle of pure white from base to weathercock .

He looks up , the script said , and sees
above him the huge , luminous eyes of a monster .

Note the black background
above the lift : a help to the inlay operator whose equipment will give the illusion of the lift moving .

above 15.5 ( 60 ) , July attaining 21 ( 70 ) .

above forty dollars a barrel , their highest level in a decade , which is almost certain to provoke another round of petrol price increases .

AFTER soaring
above $19 a barrel on Tuesday , oil prices fell back last night to $18.84 in spite of an announcement by Iran that it would cut its production next month .

Greece took emergency action on two consecutive days in October as air pollution soared
above safety levels .

BRITAIN 'S unemployment soared
above 2.6 million for the first time in over four years yesterday after a bigger than expected surge in the number of people out of work .

above a butcher 's shop in Shepherds Market , Mayfair .

` Do you live
above the shop ? "

above the mountains across the loch , and the windows rattle as the thunder booms .

When his eyes had adjusted to the darkness , he distinguished the pulsing glimmer of the stars
above the glare of the streetlights .

On the headland
above Praia do Carvoeiro and overlooking the sea sat the small white local church .

Sandpipers stalked the dunes
above the river in disciplined hunting parties .

The long desert ridges
above the far bank looked like petrified pink brocade .

I stay local for a night , then climb the ridge
above the far side of the fjord , making for Hestefjordur and a view of the big glacier .

above the Dartford Tunnels , which it runs , using the tolls to pay for the bridge .

above approximately 2300 K will produce significant quantities of nitric oxide ( NO ) .

Very few food poisoning bacteria grow if they are colder than 5 C and they are killed if heated
above 63 C .

Already the water was bubbling
above the metal floor grille on which he was standing and the submarine had adopted a strange , unnatural posture , leaning to one side .

The bag was increasing its lead , almost out of view , when it arced and plummeted like a kite
above the beach and was slammed against a rock .

As he gazed up into the heights
above he noticed a faint thickening of the air as if some of the mist had seeped inside .

William , bagged in his grubby sleeping suit , lay as always on his back , both arms flung
above his head .

She had rolled over in the night and was sleeping on her back with one arm flung
above her head .

She was solely feeling when he turned again and leaned
above her .

above 90 per cent , and for some grades such as train drivers , unionization has been virtually total .

Keith throws his hands
above his head in the touchdown sign .

above the heads of the others , straight at Jenny , who gasped and caught it .

Yawning lazily , the older man stretched his plump arms
above his head .
